item.title: Broccoli, Cauliflower, Carrots
item.description:
Ingredients Broccoli, Cauliflower, Carrots 1 cup of water Instructions Zero minutes on high with a quick release. Notes Came out tender, but not mushy.
* Photo

item.title: Broccoli, Cauliflower, Carrots
item.description: Broccoli, Cauliflower, Carrots for Zero Minutes Came out tender, but not mushy. 1 cup of water and set it to zero minutes. Zero minutes does sound a little low, but it works :) Quick release immediately after the alarm sounds to let me know that zero minutes was reached. Waiting even one minute makes the vegtables soft. * Photo

item.title: Frozen Broccoli
item.description: Ingredients Bag of frozen broccoli 1 cup of water Instructions 1 minute on high with a quick release. Notes Came out tender, but not mushy.
